news.title: Annual Teaching Program Reaches 500 Students
news.description: Our volunteer teaching program has successfully reached 500 underprivileged students this year, marking a significant milestone in our mission.

news.title: Kartavya Launches New Computer Lab
news.description: State-of-the-art computer facility inaugurated to provide digital literacy training to local community children.
